values: 刷；刷子；毛刷；画笔；轻触；电刷；灌木丛；小树丛；下层植被；短暂的接触；争执；小冲突；掠过；狐狸尾巴
（用刷子）刷净；轻拂；刷（涂料、油漆等）；打扫（尘土）；梳理（头发）；清洁（牙齿）；（在某物上）迅速地移动；（与某人）擦肩而过

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 刷（brush的过去式和过去分词）
毛茸茸的；如毛刷的；灌木丛生的

word_group.brief_definition: 丛林狼；郊狼；非法移民偷运者
迫使击球手后退以免被投出的近身球击中
认为一类人有同样的缺点
word_group.phrase: tar people with the same brush

bilingual.source: Ho dipped his brush in the paints and the magic did its work.
bilingual.target: 何把他的刷子蘸进颜料，魔法开始发挥作用。

bilingual.source: Use a brush to paint the wall.
Use a brush to scour the dirty pan.

bilingual.target: 他的刷子上有很多刚毛。

bilingual.source: He cleaned his shoes with a brush.
I use a brush to clean the carpet.
He uses a brush to paint the paint.
He dipped the brush into the paint.
You can use a brush to apply blusher.
bilingual.target: 你可以用刷子来涂腮红。

bilingual.source: The artist dipped the brush into the paint.
bilingual.target: 画家把刷子蘸进颜料里。

list.abstract: brush（[brʌʃ]），英语单词，作名词用，为刷子；毛刷；梳子。作动词用，为擦掉；掸去；轻触。短语搭配有tooth brush（牙刷），例句为“I got some paint and a brush which were left in the kitchen by my father.（我拿了一些我父亲留在厨房的油漆和刷子）”。 brush相关近义词有argument、draw、glance off等。

3D-Brush是专为游戏美工设计的，它专注于游戏模型的细节设计，集三维模型实时纹理绘制和细节雕刻功能为一身，全面取代“ZBrush+Bodypaint”的传统低效率模式，加速细节设计流程，在更短的时间内创造出更多的价值。只需导入一个低精度模型，3D-Brush便可为其自动创建UV，一次绘制，法线贴图、置换贴图、颜色贴图、透时贴图、高光贴图就同时生成了。最大材质输出支持到4096*4096，真正的无缝材质输出!

yingyinNormal.en: And I first just apply it, just all across my face and then I'll use this Sigma FLAT KABUKI stippling brush. I think it's stippling brush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先开始涂抹，覆盖到整张脸，然后使用Sigma FLAT KABUKI点状刷子,我想是点状刷子。

yingyinNormal.en: Now you brush the fur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快刷毛毛

yingyinNormal.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 睡觉之前，佩奇和乔治要刷牙。

yingyinNormal.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在上床之前，佩佩和乔治刷牙。

yingyinNormal.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上床睡觉之前，佩琪和乔治在刷牙。

yingyinNormal.en: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 睡觉之前，佩奇和乔治要刷牙。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Give me a brush. Give me the keys. No way. Well, no brush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？把梳子给我。钥匙给我。不行。那我就不给你梳子。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgot to brush. Do you want this anemone to sting you? Yes. Brush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你忘记擦防护油了。你想让这个海葵刺疼你吗? 好的。快擦。

yingyinNormal.en: You're gonna brush your teeth on my couch? No, I'm gonna brush Cinnamon's teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在沙发上刷牙？不是，我是要给肉桂刷牙。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm gonna use smutch brush and just one that allow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后用一个去污毛刷，刷一下就可以。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks for all the help. Don't forget to brush your teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你们帮我。别忘了刷牙。

yingyinNormal.en: Two it is. Okay, time for bed, I'm gonna go brush my teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就两个吧，该上床了，我要去刷牙了。

yingyinNormal.en: And then after I've got all the details and I move in with my large powder brush.
yingyinNormal.zh: 细节都处理好后，我开始使用大号散粉刷。

yingyinNormal.en: Their mother smiled and said with a purr, Fine, but at least you should brush your fur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈咪笑了 喵喵说"好吧 至少把毛刷刷好

yingyinNormal.en: Right, so march in there, brush your teeth and go to bed. But I don't want to go to bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，所以进屋去，刷刷牙，上床睡觉。但我不想睡觉。

yingyinNormal.en: Every morning Peppa and George brush their teeth. Today Peppa and George are going to the dentist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每天早上佩奇和乔治都会刷牙。今天牙医会检查他们的牙齿。

yingyinNormal.en: I use NYC SUNNY to add some goldenness to my skin. And I use a large angled contour brush to apply this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我使用的是NYC丝滑阴影修容粉饼，来给肌肤增添金色。我使用大号斜角轮廓刷来涂抹。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I guess we'll go back home and brush up on the anemone. You coming, Dory? Me? Oh I'm just going to the dropoff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看我们回家去，在海葵身上找吃的。你要来吗？多莉。我、我打算到悬崖那边去。

yingyinNormal.en: You used my toothbrush? Not the brush part just the little rubber thing to pick food from my teeth and massage my gums.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你用了我的牙刷？没用刷毛的部分，不过是用那橡皮垫剔了剔我的牙，顺便揉了揉牙床。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm using a fluffy brush from Elf and just use that to your seamlessly transition the shadows to the color of your flesh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用Elf的毛刷，用它来无缝对接眼影和皮肤的颜色。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 刷子; 画笔; 刷; 抹

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 刷子；毛刷；梳子；画笔；轻拂；轻抹；轻擦；电刷；女人；下层丛林；小树丛；灌木丛

sense_info_list.zh: 刷子; 画笔; 刷; 抹

examination_example.sentence: That's about as effective as <highlight>brushing</highlight> dirt under a carpet and can even make us ill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就像刷地毯下面的灰尘一样有效，甚至会让我们生病。

sense_info_list.en: small, low bushes or the rough land they grow on

examination_example.sentence: The state's proposed Forest Carbon Plan aims to double efforts to thin out young trees and clear <highlight>brush</highlight> in parts of the forest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该州提出的森林碳计划旨在加倍努力减少幼树和清理部分森林的灌木丛。

sense_info_list.en: touch something quickly and lightly or carelessly

word_usage.usage: brush作名词指“灌木丛；杂树丛”解，是不可数名词。
brush指“刷子；画笔；毛笔”时，是可数名词，常与名词构成复合词，如：toothbrush 牙刷。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

sense_info_list.zh: 刷子; 画笔; 刷; 抹

examination_example.sentence: Benjamin Franklin produce's his best writings at the age of 84, and Pablo Picasso put <highlight>brush</highlight> to canvas right through his eighties.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本杰明·富兰克林84岁时写出了他最好的作品，巴勃罗·毕加索80多岁时才开始创作。

examination_example.sentence: They found that the average person's mind wandered most frequently (about 65% of the time) during personal activities, such as <highlight>brushing</highlight> their teeth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，一般人在进行个人活动时，比如刷牙，思想游离的频率最高（约占65%）。

sense_info_list.en: touch something quickly and lightly or carelessly

examination_example.sentence: Our customers come in and enjoy their food and drinks while little rabbit play about and <highlight>brush</highlight> against their legs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的顾客进来享受他们的食物和饮料，而小兔子在他们的腿上玩耍和轻蹭。

examination_example.sentence: They find dirty surfaces and paint them with images or messages using cleaning <highlight>brushes</highlight> or pressure hoses (高压水管) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现肮脏的表面，并使用清洁刷或高压水管在上面涂上图像或信息。

examination_example.sentence: I remember the harsh acid smell of the cleaning solution and the scraping sound of stiff iron <highlight>brushes</highlight> against rough brick.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还记得清洁剂强烈的酸味和坚硬的铁刷在粗糙的砖块上摩擦的声音。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Tom moved his <highlight>brush</highlight> carefully backwards and forwards and stepped back to look.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 汤姆小心地前后移动他的刷子，然后退后一步看。

examination_example.sentence: The artists paint on rice paper or thin silk with <highlight>brushes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艺术家们用画笔在宣纸或薄绢上作画。

examination_example.sentence: I got some paint and a <highlight>brush</highlight> which were left in the kitchen by my father.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我拿了一些我父亲留在厨房的油漆和刷子。

examination_example.sentence: Next, the workers <highlight>brushed</highlight> ink onto the movable types.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，工人们在活字上刷墨水。

examination_example.sentence: How often do you <highlight>brush</highlight> your teeth?
To have a winning smile, make sure your teeth are clean by <highlight>brushing</highlight> them every day
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要想拥有迷人的微笑，每天刷牙，确保牙齿干净。
